results.description: Opis stanowiska: For our Client, global R&D center based in Wroclaw we are currently looking for JavaScript Developer.You will be responsible for: Development new user-facing features, Server-side development with use of Node.js, Cooperation with UX designers, Unit tests, code review, Working within scrum team (7 engineers Scrum Master) Creating technical documentation, Cooperation with global external Clients Wymagania: commercial working experience within JavaScript programming (ECMAScript 6)…
